name: Tricky Ball (SabrinaP)
description:
Made for 2021 Create with Code Game Jam. Theme: "Modernizing a classic".

https://play.unity.com/p/tricky-ball-1

We chose to modernize a classic toy by Tomi called Tricky Ball. In this game you had to move a ball across the board by pressing big yellow buttons, each one activating an obstacle. We thought reviving this fond memory was a fun way to experiment with the Unity physics engine and test different animation scripts. And also, who doesn’t like to press a big yellow button ?

Diversifier : language independent. Just press the buttons!

Team : Sabrina P, OBG21, ChristianAndersson

Tools : Unity 2020.3.8f1, Blender 2.92
